verses.verse: And <S%H3254>again<s%> the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and he <S%H5496>moved<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> against them to <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%>, <S%H4487>number<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.

For the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3097>Joab<s%> the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H2428>host<s%>, which was with him, Go now <S%H7751>through<s%> all the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, from <S%H1835>Dan<s%> even to <S%H884>Beer-sheba<s%>, and <S%H6485>number<s%> ye the <S%H5971>people<s%>, that I may <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And <S%H3097>Joab<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>, Now the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3254>add<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>, how many <S%H1992>soever<s%> they be, an <S%H3967%H6471>hundredfold<s%>, and that the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> may <S%H7200>see<s%> it: but why doth my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2654>delight<s%> in this <S%H1697>thing<s%>?

Notwithstanding the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H2388>prevailed<s%> against <S%H3097>Joab<s%>, and against the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H2428>host<s%>. And <S%H3097>Joab<s%> and the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H2428>host<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%>, to <S%H6485>number<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

¶ And they passed <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H6177>Aroer<s%>, on the right <S%H3225>side<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> that lieth in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5158>river<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, and toward <S%H3270>Jazer<s%>:

Then they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, and to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8483>Tahtim-hodshi<s%>; and they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1842>Dan-jaan<s%>, and <S%H5439>about<s%> to <S%H6721>Zidon<s%>,

And <S%H935>came<s%> to the strong <S%H4013>hold<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre<s%>, and to all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H2340>Hivites<s%>, and of the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%>: and they went <S%H3318>out<s%> to the <S%H5045>south<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, even to <S%H884>Beer-sheba<s%>.

So when they had <S%H7751>gone<s%> through all the <S%H776>land<s%>, they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> at the <S%H7097>end<s%> of <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H2320>months<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>.

And <S%H3097>Joab<s%> gave <S%H5414>up<s%> the <S%H4557>sum<s%> of the <S%H4662>number<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>: and there were in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H376%H381>men<s%> that <S%H8025>drew<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%>; and the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> were <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%>.

¶ And <S%H1732>David's<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> him <S%H310>after<s%> that he had <S%H5608>numbered<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>. And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, I have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> <S%H3966>greatly<s%> in that I have <S%H6213>done<s%>: and now, I beseech thee, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, take <S%H5674>away<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>; for I have done <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H5528>foolishly<s%>.

For when <S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H6965>up<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came unto the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, <S%H1732>David's<s%> <S%H2374>seer<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1980>Go<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%>, Thus <S%H1696>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, I <S%H5190>offer<s%> thee <S%H7969>three<s%> things; <S%H977>choose<s%> thee <S%H259>one<s%> of them, that I may do it unto <S%H6213>thee<s%>.

So <S%H1410>Gad<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%>, and <S%H5046>told<s%> him, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Shall <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> of <S%H7458>famine<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> unto thee in thy <S%H776>land<s%>? or wilt thou <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H2320>months<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thine <S%H6862>enemies<s%>, while they <S%H7291>pursue<s%> thee? or that there be <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days'<s%> <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> in thy <S%H776>land<s%>? now <S%H3045>advise<s%>, and <S%H7200>see<s%> what <S%H1697>answer<s%> I shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to him that <S%H7971>sent<s%> me.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, I am in a <S%H3966>great<s%> <S%H6887>strait<s%>: let us <S%H5307>fall<s%> now into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; for his <S%H7356>mercies<s%> are <S%H7227>great<s%>: and let me not <S%H5307>fall<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>.

¶ So the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>sent<s%> a <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> upon <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from the <S%H1242>morning<s%> even to the <S%H6256>time<s%> <S%H4150>appointed<s%>: and there <S%H4191>died<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> from <S%H1835>Dan<s%> even to <S%H884>Beer-sheba<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%>.

And when the <S%H4397>angel<s%> stretched <S%H7971>out<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> it, the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5162>repented<s%> him of the <S%H7451>evil<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4397>angel<s%> that <S%H7843>destroyed<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>, It is <S%H7227>enough<s%>: <S%H7503>stay<s%> now thine <S%H3027>hand<s%>. And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was by the <S%H1637>threshingplace<s%> of <S%H728>Araunah<s%> the <S%H2983>Jebusite<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> when he <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H4397>angel<s%> that <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Lo, I have <S%H2398>sinned<s%>, and I have done <S%H5753>wickedly<s%>: but these <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, what have they <S%H6213>done<s%>? let thine <S%H3027>hand<s%>, I pray thee, be against me, and against my <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>.

¶ And <S%H1410>Gad<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Go <S%H5927>up<s%>, <S%H6965>rear<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in the <S%H1637>threshingfloor<s%> of <S%H728>Araunah<s%> the <S%H2983>Jebusite<s%>.
And <S%H1732>David<s%>, according to the <S%H1697>saying<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, went <S%H5927>up<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%>.

And <S%H728>Araunah<s%> <S%H8259>looked<s%>, and <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> and his <S%H5650>servants<s%> coming <S%H5674>on<s%> toward him: and <S%H728>Araunah<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%>, and <S%H7812>bowed<s%> himself before the <S%H4428>king<s%> on his <S%H639>face<s%> upon the <S%H776>ground<s%>.

And <S%H728>Araunah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Wherefore is my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to his <S%H5650>servant<s%>? And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, To <S%H7069>buy<s%> the <S%H1637>threshingfloor<s%> of thee, to <S%H1129>build<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, that the <S%H4046>plague<s%> may be <S%H6113>stayed<s%> from the <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And <S%H728>Araunah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%>, Let my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> and offer <S%H5927>up<s%> what seemeth <S%H2896>good<s%> unto <S%H5869>him<s%>: <S%H7200>behold<s%>, here be <S%H1241>oxen<s%> for burnt <S%H5930>sacrifice<s%>, and threshing <S%H4173>instruments<s%> and other <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of the <S%H1241>oxen<s%> for <S%H6086>wood<s%>.

All these things did <S%H728>Araunah<s%>, as a <S%H4428>king<s%>, <S%H5414>give<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>. And <S%H728>Araunah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7521>accept<s%> thee.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H728>Araunah<s%>, Nay; but I will <S%H7069>surely<s%> <S%H7069>buy<s%> it of thee at a <S%H4242>price<s%>: neither will I <S%H5927>offer<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%> of that which doth cost me <S%H2600>nothing<s%>. So <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7069>bought<s%> the <S%H1637>threshingfloor<s%> and the <S%H1241>oxen<s%> for <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> there an <S%H4196>altar<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H5927>offered<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> and peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%>. So the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H6279>intreated<s%> for the <S%H776>land<s%>, and the <S%H4046>plague<s%> was <S%H6113>stayed<s%> from <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
